segments.text: I'm seeing a slow-motion disaster unfold in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The running water will cause significant damage if not stopped soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those lower cabinets are going to be soaked and warped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor, it's becoming a veritable shallow pond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The idea of someone slipping on that water makes me quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, creating their own smaller, yet equally dangerous, mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of them falling and breaking dishes is quite aggravating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of a perfectly good kitchen, being neglected like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me feel a bit overwhelmed by the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just step in and fix things immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of attention from the adult is baffling and infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if a spell has been cast, making her immune to reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just don't understand how one could be so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
